title: The Lord in the Heart as a Witness | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.text: You go to a big store and there'll be CCTVs different place. They'll put a board. This area
is under CCTV surveillance. That means they put a CCTV and they're informing you.
Somebody could be watching or somebody is recording. And if we see such a board there,
this is a CCTV surveillance zone. We are careful. We become alert. We don't do some
wrong things. Right? In the Bhagavatam, it is said,
Krishna is the witness of the innermost core of our heart. And the highest yogi is one
innermost core of his eye. That is why in Bhakti, we cannot cheat at all. We may cheat
externally, others, but Krishna is seated in the heart and he is watching. So we are
always in the surveillance zone of Krishna. Nothing is out of his purview.
